Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Aerotaur::
       "Let me get this straight, you've been here for as long as you can 
remember, have met the new bots, and fought with them.  And you're asking me, 
the bot with no memory, no idea where he is, and no idea who else is here, 
what we should do?"  He looks at Windlord questioningly.

--part1_7e.2a3f01f8.2a5e5f46_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<BR>       "Let me get this straight, you've been here for as long as you can remember, have met the new bots, and fought with them.  And you're asking me, the bot with no memory, no idea where he is, and no idea who else is here, what we should do?"  He looks at Windlord questioningly.</FONT></HTML>
